nodes.documentation:
@title Utility contract that provides a way to execute cheap clone deployment of the DecoEscrow contract
       on chain.
nodes.name: DecoEscrowFactory

nodes.documentation:
@dev Constructor for the contract.
@param _libraryAddress Escrow master-contract address.

@dev Updates library address with the given value.
@param _libraryAddress Address of a new base contract.
nodes.name: setLibraryAddress
createEscrow

nodes.documentation:
@title Utility contract that provides a way to execute cheap clone deployment of the DecoEscrow contract
       on chain.
nodes.name: DecoEscrowFactory

nodes.documentation:
@dev Constructor for the contract.
@param _libraryAddress Escrow master-contract address.

@dev Updates library address with the given value.
@param _libraryAddress Address of a new base contract.
nodes.name: setLibraryAddress
createEscrow

params._authorizedAddress: An addresses that is going to be authorized in Escrow contract.
params._ownerAddress: An address of the Escrow contract owner.

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

setLibraryAddress(address).details: Updates library address with the given value.

params._libraryAddress: Address of a new base contract.

setRelayContractAddress(address).details: Set the new address of the `DecoRelay` contract.

params._newAddress: An address of the new contract.

transferAnyERC20Token(address,uint256).details: Allows to trasnfer any ERC20 tokens from the contract balance to owner's address.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

devdoc.title: Utility contract that provides a way to execute cheap clone deployment of the DecoEscrow contract       on chain.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
